amendment.description: To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to ensure that individuals can keep their health insurance coverage.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2875, under the order of 12/3/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 44. Record Vote Number: 312.

action.text: Amendment SA 2875 proposed by Senator Johnson to Amendment SA 2874. (consideration: CR S8254-8255, S8264-8266, S8268-8283; text: CR S8254) To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to ensure that individuals can keep their health insurance coverage.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2875, under the order of 12/3/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 44. Record Vote Number: 312.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2875, under the order of 12/3/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 44. Record Vote Number: 312.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2875 proposed by Senator Johnson to Amendment SA 2874.
